body:
Hey guys, it's JJ here. And today, I am considering renewing the Avicus instagram! I have though about this for a while now, but now I need your guys' ideas about this. I wouldn't run it alone, and I would probably give the password to all staff (somehow), and certain others we all know. The name of it would be avic.us because 1) It's not taken, as "avicus" and "avicusnetwork" are, and 2) It's the server IP.

Ideas? Thoughts? Hate? Let me know!
body_tagged:

title: Revival of the Avicus Instagram? :o

replies.body: I'm not hating or anything but to be honest I don't think the server Administrators would give permission to do this. It would have to be with an Administrators permission.
replies.body_tagged: I'm not hating or anything but to be honest I don't think the server Administrators would give permission to do this. It would have to be with an Administrators permission.

replies.body: This is why I posted this. I have my ipod ready to go when the account is to be made, but I'd need to set everything with the officials first. :P

replies.body:
I think it would be a great idea, but the staff should definitely help you run it. Maybe I would follow if it was revived…
BTW you just got me. I was just about to post about this...

replies.body:
If you create an Instagram account on behalf of the Avicus Network, I will request to take it down... I have done it before. Social network applications (Facebook, instagram etc) will be run by the server Administrators and the Administrators alone. 

Actually, I had to laugh at the timing of this thread because Jake and I were talking about creating an Official Avicus Network Instragram. Yes, it is planned to revive the Instagram for the Avicus Network #SELFIES4DAYZ
